item.title: Changing Cache Version [Eclipse 639]
item.dc:creator: @codyskate5021 codyskate5021
item.description:
@codyskate5021 wrote:

[quote=“wildskiller, post:1, topic:421590”]I was adding the crystal key and taverly chest thing

if (def.getName().toLowerCase().contains("chest")) { if (itemUsed == 989) { player.getInventory().getContainer().remove(new Item(989, 1)); player.getInventory().addItem(1631, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(18349, 1);
But I was saddened that I couldn’t really make a random item out of certain items
Sorry I fail at coding

Here is what I attempted

if (def.getName().toLowerCase().contains("chest")) { if (itemUsed == 989) { player.getInventory().getContainer().remove(new Item(989, 1)); player.getInventory().addItem(1038, 1 || 1040, 1 || 1042, 1);
Didn’t work
I tried

if (def.getName().toLowerCase().contains("chest")) { if (itemUsed == 989) { player.getInventory().getContainer().remove(new Item(989, 1)); player.getInventory().addItem(1038, 1) || (1040, 1) || (1042, 1);
Didn’t work
How can I make the chest give random items?

If you don’t know what I am saying
here is what I am asking

[size=14pt][font=impact]HOW DO I MAKE THE CHEST GIVE RANDOM ITEMS[/font][/size][/quote]

ok thats an error i will take it out and use yours with the skills req btw read th pm i sent you sorry for my bad english i am tired right now hardly slept last night

to answer your question for giving random items is look in dicinggame.java take the random from there and modify it further i had someone give me code for it i just couldnt compile it… thanks to you its working

Read full topic

else if (itemUsed == GODSWORD ID && itemUsedWith == HILT ID) { player.getInventory().getContainer().remove(new Item(GODSWORD ID, 1)); player.getInventory().getContainer().remove(new Item(HILT ID, 1)); player.getInventory().addItem(FINISHED GODSWORD ID, 1); player.sendMessage("You attach the hilt to the godsword."); return; } but put the shard codes i did that for all ways… then i also added for godswords and it still doesnt after re compile…

over all this if you want a mining fix pm me some mining spots are glitch and half of lumbby is glitched and i fixed most of it
